Title: The Brain
Writer: Gérard Oury (a film by), Gérard Oury (scenario adaptation), Marcel Jullian (scenario adaptation), Danièle Thompson (scenario adaptation), Gérard Oury (dialogue), Marcel Jullian (dialogue), Danièle Thompson (dialogue)
Actors: Jean-Paul Belmondo, Bourvil, David Niven, Eli Wallach
Plot: Arthur and Anatole are two little robbers. They want to rob money, money that will travel in a special train from Paris to Bruxelles. They don't know that other people have planned to do the same thing.
Production: Gaumont International, Dino de Laurentiis Cinematografica
